channel.title: National Association of Educational Broadcasters Convention
channel.description:
These recordings featured highlights from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters 40th Annual Convention in 1964.,These recordings featured highlights from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters Annual Convention.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

image.title: National Association of Educational Broadcasters Convention

item.title: National Association of Educational Broadcasters Convention - Radio Business Meeting - Tape 1
item.description: This session included discussions on financial, technical, and competitive issues--including the potential of educational programming--faced by public radio.
item.dc:creator: National Association of Educational Broadcasters
item.dc:subject: United States

item.title: a-27-4/2
item.description: One of four audio segments featuring discussions of issues involving public television and radio.
